Package org.linuxforhealth.fhir.persistence.jdbc.dao.impl

Class CodeSystemDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linuxforhealth.fhir.persistence.jdbc.dao.impl.CodeSystemDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodeSystemDAO
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerbyCodeSystemDAO, PostgresCodeSystemDAO
    public class CodeSystemDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodeSystemDAO
    This DAO uses a connection provided to its constructor. It's therefore assumed to be a short-lived object, created on-the-fly. Caching etc is handled elsewhere...we're just doing JDBC stuff here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CodeSystemDAOImpl​(java.sql.Connection c, java.lang.String schemaName)
      Constructs a DAO instance suitable for acquiring connections from a JDBC Datasource object.

      • readOrAddCodeSystem

        public int readOrAddCodeSystem​(java.lang.String systemName)
                        throws FHIRPersistenceDataAccessException
        Calls a stored procedure to read the system contained in the passed Parameter in the Code_Systems table. If it's not in the DB, it will be stored and a unique id will be returned.
        Specified by:
        readOrAddCodeSystem in interface CodeSystemDAO
        Parameters:
        systemName -
        Returns:
        The generated id of the stored system.
        Throws:
        FHIRPersistenceDataAccessException
